          {% unless block.settings.link and this or t <= y or y %}
            {{- block.settings.text -}}
          {% else %}
            <a href="{{ block.settings.link }}" title="{{- block.settings.text -}}">

              {{- block.settings.text -}}
            </a>
          {% endunless %}
        </div>
      {% endfor %}
